article_title: The Carry Out 5-12-16: “Donald Trump and Paul Ryan hugged it out today but did they spoon?”
article_text:
× The Carry Out 5-12-16: “Donald Trump and Paul Ryan hugged it out today but did they spoon?”

The Carry Out is the nightly segment where Justin reads the newspaper so you don’t have to. Tonight’s top stories include Donald Trump and Paul Ryan hugging it out, House Republicans winning an Obamacare battle, Brazilian President Dilma Rousseff being impeached, a new study showing rich kids don’t hang out with poor kids, Advil numbing your kindness, the Cubs and Sox both looking to rebound, Cubs pitcher Jake Arrieta not giving a hometown discount, the NBA playoffs continuing, Orlando Magic coach Scott Skiles resigning and ABC cancelling Nashville after four seasons.

Follow Justin on Twitter and give him a like on Facebook
